Title: Establishes a farm drain tile financial assistance program; repealer
Summary: Establishes a farm drain tile financial assistance program; provides for farm drain tile financial assistance to aid farmers in adding drain tile to their fields.
LawSection: Soil and Water Conservation Districts Law
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง4-a, Cons Dists L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the soil and water conservation districts law, in relation to farm drain tile financial assistance; and to repeal section 4-a of such law relating thereto
